title: And All The Other Boys

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Try to chase me: Pick a player, and redirect all of their visitors into you.
- So here's my number: During the day you may choose to use this ability. If you do, the following night you will learn the roles of everyone that visits you. 0 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - So call me maybe: Every night you are visited by more than two players you gain an use of your second ability.

desc:
Post 2387
*Where you think you're going baby?*
